verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1471><s%>, when all the people were completely <S%H8552><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Take <S%H3947><s%> you twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H582><s%> out of the people <S%H5971><s%>, out of every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>,

And command <S%H6680><s%> you them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Take <S%H5375><s%> you here out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, out of the place where the priests <S%H3548><s%>' feet <S%H7272><s%> stood <S%H4673><s%> firm <S%H3559><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and you shall carry them over <S%H5674><s%> with you <S%H3240><s%>, and leave them in the lodging place <S%H4411><s%>, where you shall lodge <S%H3885><s%> this night <S%H3915><s%>.

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the twelve <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, whom he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, out of every <S%H259><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> a man <S%H376><s%>:

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H5674><s%>, Pass over before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> into the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and take you up <S%H7311><s%> every <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you a stone <S%H68><s%> upon his shoulder <S%H7926><s%>, according unto the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

That this may be a sign <S%H226><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H1121><s%>, that when your sons ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What mean you by these stones <S%H68><s%>?

Then you shall answer <S%H559><s%> them <S%H4325><s%>, That the waters of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut off <S%H3772><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; when it passed over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> were cut off <S%H3772><s%>: and these stones <S%H68><s%> shall be for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so as Joshua <S%H3091><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>, and took up <S%H5375><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and carried them over <S%H5674><s%> with them unto the place where they lodged <S%H4411><s%>, and laid them down there <S%H3240><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> set up <S%H6965><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, in the place where the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> stood <S%H4673><s%>: and they are there unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

For the priests <S%H3548><s%> which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, until every thing <S%H1697><s%> was finished <S%H8552><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, according to all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> hurried <S%H4116><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5971><s%>, when all the people were clean <S%H8552><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%>, that the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%>, in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, passed over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2571><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, as Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke unto them <S%H1696><s%>:

About forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> prepared <S%H2502><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> unto battle <S%H4421><s%>, to the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.

On that day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> magnified <S%H1431><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they feared <S%H3372><s%> him <S%H3372><s%>, as they feared Moses <S%H4872><s%>, all the days <S%H3117><s%> of his life <S%H2416><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Command <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> that carry <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, that they come up <S%H5927><s%> out of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> therefore commanded <S%H6680><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Come you up <S%H5927><s%> out of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3548><s%>, when the priests that bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> were come up <S%H5927><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and the soles <S%H3709><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>' feet <S%H7272><s%> were lifted up <S%H5423><s%> unto the dry land <S%H2724><s%>, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto their place <S%H4725><s%>, and flowed <S%H3212><s%> over all his banks <S%H1415><s%>, as <S%H8543><s%> they did before <S%H8032><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> out of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>, in the east <S%H4217><s%> border <S%H7097><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.
And those twelve <S%H8147><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, which they took out <S%H3947><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, did Joshua <S%H3091><s%> pitch <S%H6965><s%> in Gilgal <S%H1537><s%>.

And he spoke <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, When your sons <S%H1121><s%> shall ask <S%H7592><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What mean these stones <S%H68><s%>?
Then you shall let your sons <S%H1121><s%> know <S%H3045><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> came over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan <S%H3383><s%> on dry land <S%H3004><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5674><s%>, until you were passed over, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, which he dried up <S%H3001><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H5674><s%>, until we were gone over:

That all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> might know <S%H3045><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, that it is mighty <S%H2389><s%>: that you might fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H3117><s%>.
